properties.Name: CustomerAccountBalance
properties.Description: The Customer Account balance of the associated type as of the timestamp shown.

Columns.Name: CustomerAccountId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer Account.

Columns.Name: BalanceTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Balance Type.

Columns.Name: Timestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the associated Customer Account Balance is accurate as-of.

Columns.Name: BalanceAmount
Columns.Description: The Customer Account balance amount reported of the associated Balance Type for the associated timestamp.
